Author: NeilC

Author: NeilC
Body: BEER Coin is convertible to crypto, fiat AND real tangible brewery assets  You will also be able to use BEER Coin in our Brewpubs and via our online shop.

Author: Bitkocha

Author: NeilC
Body: Yes, The Brewery Consortium will own Algarve Rock Brewery post ICO. Algarve Rock Brewery is a working business with tangible assets.  Selling BEER Coin is a form of raising finance to scale Algarve Rock Brewery and partner with other similar sized microbreweries across the world. BEER Coin can be held and is convertible to crypto, fiat AND share of Brewery Consortium partner breweries.  The value of the coin will increase as the craft beer revolution builds.

Author: NeilC
Body: Post ICO, you will be able to spend BEER Coin in Algarve Rock brewpubs and via the Algarve Rock online store.  We have received great interest from potential partnering breweries. We will announce partnering breweries post ICO as they are signed up.  The Exchanges will also be announced post ICO.

Author: NeilC
Body: Hi!  You can learn about our entire project via our whitepaper: http://breweryconsortium.com/media/BB_WhitePaper070119_5c3484ce3c710.pdf  Do let me know if you have any further questions.

Author: Bitkocha
Body: Thank you, the project has a real production and I am sure it has a great future . Will the project conduct a bounty company ?

Author: NeilC
Body: The tokens are on offer now with an interesting bonus and referral scheme. All clients Registering enter a weekly prize draw for BEER Coin without the necessity to make a purchase. The stage we have reached is pre-ICO launch. Early bird investors are rewarded by 3 methods:  Bonus BEER up to 30% Weekly prize draw of BEER prizes up to $500 value for ALL REGISTRANTS Referral to contacts to earn 5% of any referred purchases or prize draw wins  There is nothing to lose by registering but a lot to gain by prizes and referrals.

Author: NeilC
Body: Current bounty as follows:  Bonus BEER Coin up to 30% on purchases Weekly prize draw of BEER prizes up to $500 value for ALL REGISTRANTS (i.e. no requirement to purchase) Refer to contacts to earn 5% of any referred purchases AND prize draw wins  There is nothing to lose by registering but a lot to gain by prizes and referrals and early bonuses.  Momentum is building on BEER Coin and we are rewarding early investors.

Author: NeilC
Body: Not sure what you mean by the alpha version but I can give a run down of how BEER Coin works:  Invest in BEER Coin and funds will be used to scale Brewery Consortium business = expand fully and partly owned craft breweries and associated brewpubs. The craft breweries are real businesses in full operation.  BEER Coin will be released as prizes on Brewery Consortium partner beer sales.  Expanded marketing, BEER Coin prizes and beer sales should increase Brewery Consortium profit.  BEER Coin is optionally convertible to shares in Brewery Consortium breweries (in addition to other crypto and fiat). As the Brewery Consortium value increases so should the linked value of BEER Coin.  A true consumer driven cryptocurrency.  You can discover more in the Whitepaper available at www.BreweryConsortium.com  Simply registering will enter you in weekly prize draws for BEER Coin and allow you to refer others with bonus.

Author: Miiike
Body: Given that your main feature of the token is shares, doesn't it means your token will be more related to stockmarket?

Author: NeilC
Body: Hey! Great question. Coins will be released (mined) as prizes on beer sales of partners. BEER Coin will be liquid, unlike traditional shares, but with the benefit of the option to convert into shares. Best of both worlds, a new crowd funding model.

Author: NeilC
Body: Quote from: resotendocappa on January 09, 2019, 11:20:15 AM Hello  Congratulations! You have been selected and added to icoholder.com. Find your project on our website and go through verification to add more information.  https://icoholder.com/en/brewery-consortium-coin-28416 Quote from: Korehok on January 06, 2019, 08:54:59 PM Wow, I've never seen anything like the Brewery Consortium before! The project is quite young, can I get acquainted with your previous experience?! Hi Miike, We have little experience with ICOs but if you view our WhitePaper you will see that we are serious brewers backed by consultants who have created over 100 award winning beers. You may have noticed that we won best beer in the first competition we entered in November.  We have a significant craft brewery currently capable of producing 90,000 litres pm.  We are using ICO experts to launch BEER Coin as a new model of crowdfunding. The two key value drivers are that BEER will be optionally convertible to shares in real, operating craft breweries. Also, rather than mining BEER we are releasing as prizes on beer sales by Brewery Consortium partners to stimulate trade, increased sales and desirability. We will be releasing numerous updates on medium.com but early indication is that there are many craft breweries very interested in partnering us on this venture

Author: NeilC
Body: Good point. For most craft breweries setting up an ICO is prohibitively expensive. Also, our plan is too invest in partners and drive their beer sales by releasing BEER Coin as prizes on sales. Hence, they have the benefit of BEER without the cost of creating their own token.  Multiple breweries creating their own token is no different to multiple new app developers or exchanges creating own token but in the traditional world of brewing there is less drive to do so. Also, our partner cooperation program will include the best breweries and fuel rapid expansion.

Body: Absolutely, BEER Coin can be used for trading purposes. The Exchanges will be announced once the ICO has launched.
